amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute constitutes the alternative budget plan proposed by the Progressive Caucus and appears on page H2862 of the Congressional Record of April 15, 2011.
amendment.purpose: An substitute amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-62 to eliminate the deficit by 2021, while putting America back to work, restoring America's economic competitiveness, implementing a fair tax system, keeping Americans healthy and bringing our troops back home.

action.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Grijalva.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 77 - 347 (Roll no. 274).
